existing_features.title: Update the Song Snippet upload flow (My Profile → Snippets → Upload Snippet) to accept and successfully upload audio files even when the browser does not provide a reliable MIME type (e.g., `file.type` is empty or not `audio/*`), while still rejecting clearly non-audio files.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow users to upload any audio file (support broad audio formats for uploads)

projectName: Allow uploading any audio file for song snippet uploads
